name: Warzone World
storyline:
A spin-based casual game where a slot machine meets turn-based strategy warfare. A super casual time waster for when you're bored. Optimized for mobile phones.

Build your base and train troops that you can command & conquer the world with. You won't be battling any ninjas, pirate kings or animals in this game... this is a plain and simple war game with soldiers, tanks, fighter jets and nukes.
summary:
Slots meet war... spin, build, attack, conquer the world!

Build your base and train troops that you can command & conquer the world with. You won't be battling any ninjas, pirate kings or animals in this game... this is a plain and simple war game with soldiers, tanks, fighter jets and nukes.

A spin-based casual game where a slot machine meets turn-based strategy warfare. A super casual time waster for when you're bored. Optimized for mobile phones.

* WARNING *: This is a very casual creation meant to waste time when you have nothing to do... so please don't expect action or anything too complex. And it's definitely not meant to be completed in 1 go.

Download game on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.WarzoneWorld
